mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from ( select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_enroll as noticeEnroll, notice_count as noticeCount from notice_db order by 1 desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_enroll as noticeEnroll, notice_count as noticeCount from notice_db order by 1 desc where
notice_title like '%#{search}%'
notice_content like '%#{search}%'
notice_writer like '%#{search}%'
and notice_enroll between to_date('#{week}') and sysdate
and notice_enroll between to_date('#{month}') and sysdate

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_enroll as noticeEnroll, notice_count as noticeCount from notice_db where notice_no = #{_parameter}
select img_no as imgNo, filename, filepath, img_type as imgType, type_no as typeNo from img_db where imgType = 'n' and type_no = #{_parameter}
